thread.section_title: ToursByLocals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ToursByLocals | www.toursbylocals.com
thread.title: gloria

author: gloria
title: gloria
text: Our guide, Hiroshi T. taught us to navigate the trains with ease. We could not have asked for a better guide, a nicer person or a more wonderful introduction to Tokyo. Hiroshi's English-super. It may sound silly but this might explain it - we bought tamagoyaki at the Tsukiji Market. We offered a bite to Hiroshi and he jumped right in -no formality. It was a day of laughter and fun and learning shared among friends. He taught us so much without once making it seem like a lecture.
